question.body: The most common dietary lipids are:

response.feedback: Incorrect. Although waxes are lipids they are not the most commonly eaten type of lipid.
Incorrect. Although some pigments are lipids they are not the most commonly eaten type of lipid.
Incorrect. Although cholesterol is a lipid it is not the most commonly eaten type of lipid.
Correct. Triglycerides consisting of a glycerol molecule and three fatty acid chains are the most commonly eaten lipid, think about saturated and unsaturated fats.
